summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the scheduling of a meeting between Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team, specifically with Paul and the DB team managing Epstein's accounts. The email highlights the communication between Amanda Kirby and Lesley regarding Epstein's availability for the meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as the individual requesting a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to manage his accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank who is coordinating the meeting with Epstein and the DB team.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as a member of the Deutsche Bank team who will be involved in the meeting with Epstein.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is referenced as the person who informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is coordinating the scheduling of the meeting with Epstein and the DB team.

connections.description: Epstein is the client meeting with Paul and the Deutsche Bank team.
Amanda and Lesley are both associates at Deutsche Bank coordinating the meeting.
Harry informed Amanda about Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting Scheduling
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled between Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team for the week of October 8.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein requested a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team to manage his accounts.
The meeting is proposed for October 7 or October 8, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is coordinating the meeting and has communicated with Harry regarding Epstein's request.
